name: Healthcare System - Tactical Design
description: Tactical design for a healthcare scheduling bounded context (entities, aggregates, events)

inputs.domainDescription: Healthcare appointment scheduling system for a hospital network. Patients can book appointments with doctors across multiple specialties and locations. The system manages doctor availability, appointment slots, patient medical records, prescription management, and billing. It coordinates with insurance verification, lab results integration, and follow-up scheduling.

note: This example assumes strategic design was completed in a previous run

aggregates.name: Appointment
invariants: Appointment must have valid time slot
Patient can have max 3 pending appointments

aggregates.name: Schedule
invariants: Schedule must respect doctor working hours
